definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance

sentences.english: If I were the ocean, Would you be the sky?
sentences.chinese: 如果我是海洋，你可否變做天空。

sentences.english: If we bring it into the funds, we shall maybe lose the principal and all.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們把它變做公債，我們也許會喪失本金和一切。

sentences.english: From that time he was the most humble, modest, and importunate man alive in his courtship.
sentences.chinese: 從那時候起他變做世上最自謙，最有禮貌，最。

sentences.english: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform. it into a door.
sentences.chinese: 不要浪費時間敲一堵牆，你無法將其變做一扇門。

sentences.english: On that day, Zeus transformed himself into a hawk flying over the sky of Troy.
sentences.chinese: 這天，宙斯變做一隻老鷹，降臨在特洛伊城的上空。
